Definition: In this task, you are given an Amazon review and a category for the product being reviewed. Your task is to classify whether the given category matches the review. Output "True" if the review and its category match, otherwise output "False".

I unpackaged the entire chair and hardware before noticing this. So, I'll spend twice the amount of time boxing up the whole useless thing and send it back with a 1-star review of part of a chair I never got to sit in. I will go so far as to include a picture of what their injection molding and quality assurance process missed though. I will be hesitant to buy again. It makes me wonder if there aren't missing structures and supports that don't impede the assembly process. 
 Category: furniture
Positive Examples.explanation: It's the correct category. Because the customer gives a review of the product which belongs to the furniture category, which we can see it from the way the customer describes his experience sharing how he unpackaged his chair.
